subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Composer David Barrett wrote “One Shining Moment,” which accompanies the short video montage that CBS uses to recap the agony and the ecstasy of March Madness.
snippet: Composer David Barrett wrote “One Shining Moment,” which accompanies the short video montage that CBS uses to recap the agony and the ecstasy of March Madness.
